version_description: Every Thursday head to your Discover tab for a big old personalised rail of newly announced shows picked for you, by us. Keep yourself in the loop, you’re never missing a gig again. We’ve heard ‘Thursday is the new Friday’ countless times, but now it’s really gonna feel like it.

We’ve gotten pretty good at recommending the best events for our fans, but it’s true, no-one knows you as well as YOU know you.

Next time you buy a ticket, you’ll be able to tell us which artists you really really like and which ones you really really don’t. This will help us to make your Discover page really really good and get you out to even more events.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.

New Shows Thursday is our latest and greatest feature, bringing you just-announced gigs and tours every Thursday, so you never miss out on tickets for your faves. It’s updated every week and thanks to our very clever algorithm it’s personalised, meaning you’re shown events you’ll be super into and nothing you won’t.

We’ve gotten pretty good at recommending the best events for our fans, but it’s true, no-one knows you as well as YOU know you.

Next time you're on Discover, you’ll be able to tell us which artists you really really like and which ones you really really don’t. This will help us to make your Discover page really really good and get you out to even more events.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.

DICE is all about quality gigs and recommendations, but we went a little overboard when it came to image quality. We’ve reduced data usage A LOT in this update, so feel free to discover without waiting to connect to WIFI.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.

Connecting your Spotify with DICE means you can find out when your favourite artists announce a new show. And now, it’s much easier to do so.

This release also had some under the hood fixes for purchasing via Apple Pay.

2-4-1 deals can be confusing. Do I buy 2 tickets and the second is free? Do I buy 1 and get given another? Well, some fans have experienced this before and we wanted to make it as easy as possible. In those cases, you'll only be able to purchase 2 tickets (or 4, or 6). No more confusion.

2-4-1 deals can be confusing. Do I buy 2 tickets and the second is free? Do I buy 1 and get given another? Well, some fans have experienced this before and we wanted to make it as easy as possible. In those cases, you'll only be able to purchase 2 tickets (or 4, or 6). No more confusion.

First impressions count, so there's now a fun new feature waiting for you when you sign up to DICE. Have a play with our new Artist Picker, quickly link your Spotify or Apple Music account, and when you land on Discovery you’ll be greeted by your very own personalised event guide.
If you've been lucky enough to score some DICE Credit, you can now easily unlock it right from your Profile. The only hard part will be deciding what to spend it on.

First impressions count, so there's now a fun new feature waiting for you when you sign up to DICE. Have a play with our new Artist Picker, quickly link your Spotify or Apple Music account, and when you land on Discovery you’ll be greeted by your very own personalised event guide.
We're making it even easier for you to get personalised recommendations you'll love from DICE. Take a look and see what we've got for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
A few of you might have experienced crashes on the last version. We've fixed it. Get this latest version and find your next event.
NITE DICE and Discover crash fixes. You’re good to go.
We've given you the option to translate your app into Italian.
We're making it even easier for you to get personalised recommendations you'll love from DICE. Take a look and see what we've got for you.
We love security. Your payments are now extra secure.
We've made some updates so that you get that smooth iOS-13 level experience.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
Quick little one for you. We've neatened up the navigation bar to make it easier for you to... navigate.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.

Everyone deserves the best friends possible – that’s why we’ve updated our Friends feature.

Now you and your mates can follow each other on DICE, share info about the events you're saving or booking and get that quality time locked in.

But don't forget – the key to great friendship is boundaries, so you won't have anyone following you unless you've already given them your phone number.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
You told us that you keep searching for the same events again and again. So this release, we've bumped the shows you've already looked at to the top of your search results.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
From now on, we’ll be highlighting the undeniably huge events we've got coming up by featuring them separately in your Discover tab – you can’t miss them, literally.

With this release, we’re making it easier for you to choose an event.
We've taken our number one pick for you - based on your music library, and the tickets you buy - and put it right at the top of your Discover tab. It's big. It's beautiful. It's an event you shouldn't miss.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
We've made DICE even better. Tickets for the best gigs, clubs & festivals, just for you.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.

Wish it was easier to pick the perfect show for you and a friend? One you'll both enjoy, that matches both your tastes? Now you can head to their profile, and see recommendations for shows that do just that.

We built profiles to make going out easier. Now you'll always have something to do, together.

––

Didn't know you could find your friends on DICE? Scan your phone contacts to follow people and start making plans.

As a response to COVID-19, we have made it easy to see which events are going ahead, and which are postponed, rescheduled, or cancelled. Head to your tickets or to the event in the app to track the status, and see a note from event organisers detailing their refund policy.

We know this is a difficult time - for fans, for venues, and for organisers. We're updating events information regularly, and working closely with the industry to stay ahead of developments.

Say hello to DICE TV. Since we’re all stuck inside, we’re going to keep you company with online events you can stream from the comfort of your own home.

Your ticket will have a link to the stream, you can invite friends, and as always, we'd love to know what you think.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.

Two things of note:

1. Previously, if you were in a city where DICE wasn’t live yet then you wouldn’t see any live events – now that we have so many great live streams happening, we’ll populate your Discover with online events.

2. This also means that recommendations aren’t tied to your location. In fact, if you’ve synced your music library, the streams that appear in Discover are tailored to your tastes.

You'll be happy to know you can now follow your favourite artists. By doing so we'll notify you when they're doing a gig, so you don't miss out on seeing them.

And if you come across an event where you don't know the support act or someone on the line-up, jumping to their artist profile will give you a better idea of who they are and what to expect.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.

Search has had a little makeover – filtering events by type, genre, price and date is a lot cleaner, and now it all sits under the magnifying glass (groundbreaking, we know). Anything you've recently searched for will also stick around, just in case you need to find it again. As always, if you have any feedback – email help@dice.fm.
This was a little release: some bug fixes, and tweaks to make your experience smoother. Keep any eye out for more soon.

This release is all about tickets. We’ve made a tonne of little tweaks to the design, making it easier to suss what type of tickets you've got and highlighting whether it's in real life or online. If you've got any feedback, let us know at help@dice.fm.
